reviewText: I am sure Dr. John Gray has saved many relationships with this dvd...I am a better spouse because of this tape!

This video was very educational . Really is a must see. This is good for anyone interested in having a peaceful relationship with the opisite sex. It shows you how everyone comunicates with each other.

Very easy to watch DVD!  Humorous and right to the point and it really helps each person gain some insight into how their partner is wired! It brings common sense together with the questions of everyday relationship issues.  Watch it with your partner or even on your own you will learn something new each time you watch it.

This new 60 minute DVD is a good summary and update from DR John Gray. However, it does not compare with the VHS Completed edition. Hopefully A DVD version of "men are from mars, women are from venus" will be available in the near future. Having a fully transfered VHS to DVD version would be so much more helpful. Plus nothing would be ommitted from the original.

Paul
Colorado Springs, CO
Dr Gray is very good at giving good information that is gentle and very funny. This is a good one. diana
